metadata.title: CVE-2024-5594 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
OpenVPN before 2.6.11 does not santize PUSH_REPLY messages properly whichattackers can use to inject unexpected arbitrary data into third-partyexecutables or plug-ins.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-5594` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

openvpn - 2.6.9-1ubuntu4.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openvpn package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.6.9-1ubuntu4.1').
